page.title: 09The Mill
page.content: S.C.A.T.S.Animal Feed Mill {Local History}There has been a mill on the site since 1380 using water power.There is still a water wheel under the present mill.The old mill building was rebuilt in 1880 following a fire.The new building was erected in 1950 and re-modernised in 1968. {Trade}The mill was bought by the Southern Counties Agricultural Trading Society in 1978.This society began as a farmers' cooperative buying animal food in bulk.They now produce many different foodstuffs themselves and sell to wholesalers. {Employment}S.C.A.T.S. employs 6 workers in the mill ,several drivers and representatives and 3 laboratory technicians together with management and office staff. {Scienceand Technology} Computerisation will begin in 1985.
